warden_exp.advancement.root.desc: The Deep Dark Waits For You!
warden_exp.advancement.diamond_is_unbrea: Get attacked by a Warden wearing a Diamond Armor
warden_exp.advancement.diamond_is_legend: Defeat A FUCKING WARDEN wearing only Diamond Armor!
warden_exp.advancement.strength_challeng: Throw a bottle of strength at a warden and defeat him with an iron sword
